entry.title: Third-Party Scripts in React
entry.summary: In React projects, there often comes a time when you’ll want to integrate with a third-party service. Maybe it’s an analytics or tracking service, or a data or graphics provider like Google Maps. Whatever it is, injecting the external script can be tricky at the component level.
